info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 8:51PM CST until January 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow and dangerous travel conditions expected. Total snow accumulations in excess of 6 inches and wind gusts in excess of 40 mph are expected, with the highest snow totals across western Lake county. * WHERE...Lake IL County. * WHEN...Until midnight CST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates will exceed 1 inch per hour at times early Tuesday morning and again Tuesday afternoon. The strongest winds will occur Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
